body:

```

15 verbose tar pack [ 'C:\\Users\\Administrator\\AppData\\Roaming\\npm-cache\\minecraft-protocol\\0.14.0\\package.tgz',
```

comment_data.body:
I cannot reproduce this issue, despite having the same nodejs and npm version, and being on Windows 8.1 (which should be close enough to your platform, only visible discrepency is you are running Win8).

I suggest you remove your `%USERPROFILE%/.npm` folder and try the installation again (that folder is a cache npm keeps to speed up installation). For some reason, your npm is trying to run the prepublish script when it clearly shouldn't be.

Please report if deleting the .npm folder worked :)
Closing. If you are still having the issue, please re-open.
My os is windows server 2012. Maybe that would help understanding the problem. I was trying to get your package but I had found an alternative (a c# library), so I don't plan on trying again...

title: "gulp" failing
